author: Simon Nixon
title: Italy Still Has Time to Avert a Disaster
text:
A tumultuous week for Italy in the financial markets—and some worrying signs of contagion—have prompted the inevitable warnings that the eurozone debt crisis is back and that the common currency is again on the brink of collapse.
Yet the situation in Italy today is very different from the crises that engulfed the eurozone between 2010 and 2015. It is at the same time both potentially more serious and yet more easily resolved.
